decisions.decision: Schedule format: first Wednesday/Thursday of month for AMAs, third week Thursday for community discussion, flexible weeks for other content
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: Changing up the format of community calls
decisions.quote: So we'll do that the first Wednesday, first Thursday of every month. And then we'll leave the week after that for flexible things... And then for sure, we'll have the third week Thursday, we're going to have the classic community chat, community discussion format

commitments.commitment: Off-chain bots will start working today, UI launch expected Saturday or Sunday
commitments.timeline: today for bots, Saturday/Sunday for UI
commitments.quote: So off-chain bots will start to work today. And from Saturday or Sunday, we are expecting a UI launch

commitments.commitment: Launch a program for community to crowdsource liquidity for AMM v3 type pool on PancakeSwap
commitments.quote: So this is my next step. I already have in my mind the program that we will launch for the community, probably in one month's time, to crowdsource the liquidity to build AMM v3 type of pool on PancakeSwap

commitments.commitment: Open source USE off-chain bots code after polishing
commitments.quote: So yeah, currently the code for off-chain bots done by coder for USE is closed, but he is promising to open source the bots quickly after polishing the code

commitments.commitment: Discuss two liquidity pools concept with Bruno
commitments.quote: Yeah, actually, very interesting. I would discuss it with Bruno, I guess, next week

commitments.commitment: Get another Lithos testnet update with collateral system and client API
commitments.quote: We're going to get another update, you know, probably in a couple of days, getting the collateral system working properly again, along with the client's API

commitments.commitment: Put together airdrop for testnet miners and bonus for fraud proof detection
commitments.quote: We are putting together, like a airdrop thing, for people that have mined the test net or, you know, maybe even a little bonus for people that are able to slash our fraud and that we're putting on the network

commitments.commitment: Present papers at stability workshop in Jaipur
commitments.quote: About the papers, we've got a bunch of papers accepted for the first stability workshop which will take place in Jaipur city, India on December 15th. I will present the chain cache paper there. Also Luca will present Dexy paper and Bruno with different co-authors including Luca will present also a few papers

commitments.commitment: Give short talk at hackathon beginning
commitments.quote: Bruno also invited me to give a short talk at the beginning of the hackathon, which will be from December 13th

commitments.commitment: Start another DevNet in a few days
commitments.quote: So on, well, I'm currently not sure about next week, but yeah, well, it's close and we will start another DevNet... It will be started in a few days
